May 11, 2016, Sam worked with Dan in different groups

I first met Dan in September 2011, when I interviewed with HubSpot. I was immediately struck by his enthusiastic tone and genuine interest in me as a candidate. Since then, and over the past 5 years working with him, I've confirmed time and again that the first impression Dan gives off is not a 'facade' or in any way divergent from what you get later on down the track (as can be the case with others). He's a terrific mentor, personal coach/business advisor, and friend. He is comfortable in his own skin, super intelligent, adaptable to massive organizational/market changes, and always fun/positive.Those of us who have him on our team, are lucky. If you have the opportunity to work with Dan, I recommend it.

Skilled at  inbound marketing, inbound sales, inbound service & building a culture of personal responsibility and achievement. My goal for the next 30 years is to do the most good in the universe. Public speaker on The Inbound Organization, Dan Tyre on Attitude, SMarketing: Sales & Marketing Alignment, Hiring & Motivating Sales Millennials & How to Sell, Even if You've Never Sold Before, How to Be Your Own Best Cheerleader without Ruffling other Peoples Pom Pom, How to Build Rapport with Anyone & How I generated 1,000+ Customers with 1 Blog article!
